name: New World
summary: Fate has summoned you to the shores of Aeternum, the Eternal Isle. Overcome the brutal legions of The Corrupted and draw battle lines with competing players in this open world MMO fraught with danger and opportunity. In a land hell-bent on your destruction, what will you do to survive?
info:
• 中文名: 新世界
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: MMO
  • 游玩人数: 多人
  • 发行日期: 2021年春
  • 官方网站: https://www.newworld.com/en-us
  • 开发: Amazon Games
  • 发行: Amazon Games
